CustomField.description: Indicates the date when an asset"s age starts being tracked. This date can be entered or automatically calculated based upon the rules defined by the Administrator. Please contact your administrator for more details.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the date when an asset"s age starts being tracked. This date can be entered or automatically calculated based upon the rules defined by the Administrator. Please contact your administrator for more details.
CustomField.label: Asset Birthdate
